Worked like a charm on the first try, by following the directions exactly. The rest of the comments are correct: I had to run the Alcohol program AFTER installing--as in every time you want to use it--as an administrator for it to succeed. This is made easier by either disabling UAC, or by changing the properties of the file and checking Run as Administrator.
